Subcommittee on Domestic Marketing, Consumer Relations, and Nutrition

official_title: A bill to require the Secretary of Agriculture to make a grant to a member of the land grant university system which completed construction of a biomedical research center in May, 1986, and which has an established trust fund for receipt of operating and construction funds, to conduct human nutrition research.

summary.text: Requires the Secretary of Agriculture to make a grant under the National Agricultural Research, Extension, and Teaching Policy Act of 1977 to a specified member of the land grant university system to conduct human nutrition research. Authorizes appropriations effective October 1, 1987.

titles.title: A bill to require the Secretary of Agriculture to make a grant to a member of the land grant university system which completed construction of a biomedical research center in May, 1986, and which has an established trust fund for receipt of operating and construction funds, to conduct human nutrition research.
